data.message:
Violence is always the wrong solution .....
It always hits the small citizens ....

because of some wrong people to think other people take the life .......
My thoughts are with the children, the mothers and fathers ... with all stakeholders who have lost their loved ones ......
My thoughts are with those who have fled their homeland ....
no matter what corner of this earth ......
Violence is never a solution.
Finally listening to it!!! :(((((((((((((
